Based on your preferences for a great Britain movie, here are two recommendations:

1. Pride and Prejudice (1913) - This classic romance novel by Jane Austen is set in England during the late 18th century. The story follows the lives of two young women named Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy. As the two young women become more acquainted with each other, they discover that they have more in common than they initially thought. Throughout this classic romance novel, Austen explores themes such as love, marriage, social class, and personal growth. If you enjoy classic romance novels, then I highly recommend giving Pride and Prejudice a try!
